name: Concrete Jungle
summary: Concrete Jungle is a city planning deck-building game. Place buildings using cards in your deck and earn new ones as you progress! A genre-blending game packed with cool ideas that swaps micro-management for a more puzzle-like approach to city planning.
info:
• 中文名: 水泥丛林
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: iOS
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: SLG
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2015年9月23日
  • 开发: ColePowered Games
  • 发行: ColePowered Games
